mapper.select: select id, pw from user_info where id=#{id}
select max(seqno) as max_seqno from notice
select seqno,title,content,id,bbs_date from notice order by seqno desc
select count(*) as num from notice
select * from notice where seqno < #{seqno} order by seqno desc
select count(*) as num from notice where seqno > #{seqno}
select seqno,title,id,bbs_date from ( select seqno,title,id,bbs_date,rownum rn from ( select * from notice order by seqno desc ) ) where (rn > ((#{no}-1)*5)) and (rn < ((#{no}-1)*5+6))
select count(*) as num from ( select seqno, rownum rn from ( select * from notice order by seqno desc ) ) where rn > ((#{no}-1)*5)
